5de922d4b11454561e39239f.Name: MP9 charging handle

5df24cf80dee1b22f862e9bc.Description: ORSIS T-5000M is a Russian bolt-action sniper rifle. It was the first product developed by ORSIS, and is produced in their Moscow factory. The rifle was introduced in 2011 at the international exhibition of Russian weapons in Nizhny Tagil, and is entirely original, using no third-party components. The rifle ensures maximum comfort of the user while aiming and shooting, featuring a quick sighting line recovery, high reliability and ergonomics. The stainless steel barrel has a thread for installing a muzzle brake-compensator or a sound suppressor. The equipped muzzle brake-compensator effectively reduces impulse and allows the most comfortable recoil handling.
5df24cf80dee1b22f862e9bc.Name: Orsis T-5000M .308 bolt-action sniper rifle

5df256570dee1b22f862e9c4.Description: A 660mm long match-grade barrel manufactured by Orsis for the T-5000M .308 bolt-action sniper rifle.
5df256570dee1b22f862e9c4.Name: T-5000M .308 660mm barrel

5df25b6c0b92095fd441e4cf.Description: A 5-round magazine for the T-5000M .308 sniper rifle, manufactured by Orsis.
5df25b6c0b92095fd441e4cf.Name: Orsis T-5000M .308 5-round magazine

5df25d3bfd6b4e6e2276dc9a.Description: A standard handguard for the T-5000M bolt-action sniper rifle, manufactured by Orsis.
5df25d3bfd6b4e6e2276dc9a.Name: Orsis T-5000M handguard

5df35ddddfc58d14537c2036.Description: Universal standard T-5000M sniper rifle stock, manufactured by Orsis.
5df35ddddfc58d14537c2036.Name: Orsis T-5000M stock

5df35e59c41b2312ea3334d5.Description: A standard aluminum body for the T-5000M bolt-action sniper rifle, manufactured by Orsis.
5df35e59c41b2312ea3334d5.Name: Orsis T-5000M aluminium body

5df35e7f2a78646d96665dd4.Description: A standard-issue muzzle brake for the T-5000M bolt-action sniper rifle, manufactured by Orsis.
5df35e7f2a78646d96665dd4.Name: Orsis T-5000M muzzle brake

5df35e970b92095fd441e4d2.Description: Universal scope mount for the T-5000M sniper rifle, manufactured by Orsis. Allows installation of various scopes.
5df35e970b92095fd441e4d2.Name: Orsis T-5000M scope mount

5df35ea9c41b2312ea3334d8.Description: The long length rail for T-5000M sniper rifle allows installation of additional tactical equipment on the handguard. Manufactured by Orsis.
5df35ea9c41b2312ea3334d8.Name: Orsis T-5000M long length rail

5df35eb2b11454561e3923e2.Description: The medium length rail for T-5000M sniper rifle allows installation of additional tactical equipment on the handguard. Manufactured by Orsis.
5df35eb2b11454561e3923e2.Name: Orsis T-5000M medium length rail

5df36948bb49d91fb446d5ad.Description: A padded grip for the T-5000M sniper rifle, manufactured by Orsis.
5df36948bb49d91fb446d5ad.Name: Orsis T-5000M padded handguard grip

5df38a5fb74cd90030650cb6.Description: An ergonomic pistol grip for the T-5000M bolt-action sniper rifle, manufactured by Orsis.
5df38a5fb74cd90030650cb6.Name: Orsis T-5000M pistol grip

5df8a2ca86f7740bfe6df777.Description: An old army body armor from Afghanistan war times, mainly designed to protect against pistol bullets and explosion fragments. It fulfilled its mission, but was soon replaced by bulletproof vests with differentiated protection.
5df8a2ca86f7740bfe6df777.Name: 6B2 armor (Flora)

5df8a42886f77412640e2e75.Description: Multi-Purpose Patrol Vest is designed for those patrolling situations where armor is not needed. A lightweight rig with a lot of pouches.
5df8a42886f77412640e2e75.Name: Velocity Systems Multi-Purpose Patrol Vest

5df8a4d786f77412672a1e3b.Description:
The 6Sh118 raid backpack is part of the 2nd generation "Ratnik" gear kit for combat.
The 6Sh118 tactical army backpack is a modernization of the 6B38 Permyachka model raid backpack. The raid 6Sh118 backpack is designed to carry fire support equipment, weapons, ammunition, elements of mountain equipment, as well as the personal belongings of individual soldiers. The backpack can be used during combat operations, long hikes, and raid events.
5df8a4d786f77412672a1e3b.Name: 6Sh118 raid backpack

5df8a58286f77412631087ed.Description: Soft tank crew helmet with headset TSh-4M-L (Z) -01 is designed to provide two-way radiotelephone communication in objects with a high level of noise, to protect it from climatic factors and from impacts on structural elements of objects.
5df8a58286f77412631087ed.Name: TSh-4M-L soft tank crew helmet

5df8a6a186f77412640e2e80.Description: A red ornament ball for decorating the Christmas tree.
5df8a6a186f77412640e2e80.Name: Christmas tree ornament (Red)

5df8a72c86f77412640e2e83.Description: A white ornament ball for decorating the Christmas tree.
5df8a72c86f77412640e2e83.Name: Christmas tree ornament (White)

5df8a77486f77412672a1e3f.Description: A violet ornament ball for decorating the Christmas tree.
5df8a77486f77412672a1e3f.Name: Christmas tree ornament (Violet)

5df8ce05b11454561e39243b.Description: The SR-25 Precision Rifle is the latest evolution of the precision 7.62mm NATO semi-automatic rifle. An ambidextrous bolt release, selector, and magazine release offers the left-handed user the ergonomic advantages inherent to AR-15 based controls, as well as giving right-handed users alternate methods of manipulation to increase efficiency of movement. The Drop-In 2-Stage Trigger serves as an aid to long range precision marksmanship. The E2 bolt and gas system provides superior reliability in function whether suppressed or unsuppressed.
5df8ce05b11454561e39243b.Name: Knight's Armament Company SR-25 7.62x51 marksman rifle

5df8e053bb49d91fb446d6a6.Description: Regular charging handle for SR-25 and compatible systems, manufactured by Knights Armament Company.
5df8e053bb49d91fb446d6a6.Name: SR-25 charging handle

5df8e085bb49d91fb446d6a8.Description: Ambidextrous Charging Handle for SR-25 marksman rifle and AR-10 compatible systems. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Corporation.
5df8e085bb49d91fb446d6a8.Name: SR-25 Ambidextrous charging handle

5df8e4080b92095fd441e594.Description: An upper receiver for the SR-25 rifle, manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.
5df8e4080b92095fd441e594.Name: SR-25 7.62x51 upper receiver

5df8f535bb49d91fb446d6b0.Description: A 10-round, double stack, steel magazine for 7.62x51 NATO cartridges. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.
5df8f535bb49d91fb446d6b0.Name: KAC 7.62x51 10-round steel magazine

5df8f541c41b2312ea3335e3.Description: A 20-round, double stack, steel magazine for 7.62x51 NATO cartridges. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.
5df8f541c41b2312ea3335e3.Name: KAC 7.62x51 20-round steel magazine

5df916dfbb49d91fb446d6b9.Description: URX-4 is a 14.5 inch long, lightweight M-LOK compatible handguard for AR-10 system rifles.
5df916dfbb49d91fb446d6b9.Name: AR-10 URX 4 handguard

5df917564a9f347bc92edca3.Description: A 16 inch (406mm) barrel for AR-10 based weapons for 7.62x51 NATO ammo.
5df917564a9f347bc92edca3.Name: SR-25 7.62x51 16 inch barrel

5dfa397fb11454561e39246c.Description: A 20 inch (508mm) barrel for AR-10 based weapons for 7.62x51 NATO ammo.
5dfa397fb11454561e39246c.Name: SR-25 7.62x51 20 inch barrel

5dfa3cd1b33c0951220c079b.Description: Knight's Armament Company Flash Suppressor Kit is an effective flash hider that also serves as a platform for attaching a PRS QDC sound suppressor. It can be Installed on AR-10 platform weapons.
5dfa3cd1b33c0951220c079b.Name: KAC QDC 7.62x51 flash suppressor kit

5dfa3d2b0dee1b22f862eade.Description: Knight's Armament Company PRS QDC sound suppressor, which can be installed on a compatible KAC QDC Flash Suppressor Kit.
5dfa3d2b0dee1b22f862eade.Name: KAC PRS/QDC 7.62x51 sound suppressor

5dfa3d45dfc58d14537c20b0.Description: A low-profile gas block designed for use in SR-25 marksman rifles and AR-10 compatible weapon systems. Manufactured by Knight's Armament Company.
5dfa3d45dfc58d14537c20b0.Name: SR-25 Low Profile Gas Block

5dfa3d7ac41b2312ea33362a.Description: Knight's Armament Company removable folding rear sight.
5dfa3d7ac41b2312ea33362a.Name: KAC Folding Micro rear sight

5dfa3d950dee1b22f862eae0.Description: Knight's Armament Company removable folding front sight.
5dfa3d950dee1b22f862eae0.Name: KAC Folding Micro front sight

5dfcd0e547101c39625f66f9.Description: MK1 Freefloat modular chassis with KeyMod slots designed for SVD rifles for installation of various optics and tactical devices. Manufactured by Sureshot Armament Group.
5dfcd0e547101c39625f66f9.Name: SVD SAG MK1 Freefloat Chassis

5dfce88fe9dc277128008b2e.Description: Custom cut off SVD dust cover, required for mounting special chassis systems.
5dfce88fe9dc277128008b2e.Name: SVDS custom dust cover

5dfe14f30b92095fd441edaf.Description: ETMI-019 is a universal adapter from 7mm vent plank to Weaver/Picatinny type rails.
5dfe14f30b92095fd441edaf.Name: ETMI-019 shotgun rail mount

5dfe6104585a0c3e995c7b82.Description: Advance Dual Optic (ADO) 3X-9X variable magnification scope with a 42mm objective lens. The ADO Scope features an integrated Red Dot Reflex Optic on top of the scope body. Manufactured by NcSTAR.
5dfe6104585a0c3e995c7b82.Name: NcSTAR ADO P4 Sniper 3-9x42 riflescope

5dff772da3651922b360bf91.Description: Designed for shooting at small and medium distances. The sight will be convenient for shooting at moving objects at a distance of up to 150m.
5dff772da3651922b360bf91.Name: VOMZ Pilad 4x32 riflescope

5dff77c759400025ea5150cf.Description: 25.4mm low profile rings mount manufactured by UTG.
5dff77c759400025ea5150cf.Name: UTG 25mm ring mount

5dff8db859400025ea5150d4.Description: Low-profile side mount, all-milled from a bar of high-strength aluminum alloy B95T. Designed to fit on SVD sniper for various optics installation, but can also be fitted on Vepr Hunter, AS Val and VSS rifles. Manufactured by Sureshot Armament Group.
5dff8db859400025ea5150d4.Name: SVD SAG low sidemount

5e00903ae9dc277128008b87.Description: The Brügger & Thomet MP9 (Maschinenpistole 9mm, German for machine pistol) is a selective-fire 9x19mm Parabellum caliber machine pistol designed and manufactured by Brügger & Thomet of Switzerland. A perfect choice for a Personal Defense Weapon (PDW).
5e00903ae9dc277128008b87.Name: B&T MP9 9x19 submachine gun

5e0090f7e9dc277128008b93.Description: An upper receiver for the MP9 SMG, manufactured by Brügger & Thomet.
5e0090f7e9dc277128008b93.Name: MP9 9x19 upper receiver

5e00c1ad86f774747333222c.Description: One of the most recent tactical ballistic helmets with extensive customization capabilities. The EXFIL LTP (Lightweight, Tactical, Polymer) bump helmet provides impact protection for maritime environments and a stable, comfortable platform for mounting night vision and other accessories. The built-in NVG shroud utilizes an integrated Wilcox machined aluminum shroud insert. Black colored version.
5e00c1ad86f774747333222c.Name: Team Wendy EXFIL Ballistic Helmet (Black)

5e00cdd986f7747473332240.Description: Low-profile, lightweight bulletproof glass faceplate that quickly and tool-free attaches to the front of the Team Wendys EXFIL helmet.
5e00cdd986f7747473332240.Name: TW EXFIL Ballistic helmet face shield (Black)

5e00cfa786f77469dc6e5685.Description: Additional armored ear covers for a Team Wendy EXFIL Ballistic helmet.
5e00cfa786f77469dc6e5685.Name: TW EXFIL Ear Covers (Black)

5e01e9e273d8eb11426f5bc3.Description: Thread adapter manufactured by Rotor 43. Allows installation of the SVDS muzzle brake on the SVDS sniper rifle.
5e01e9e273d8eb11426f5bc3.Name: SVDS Rotor 43 thread adapter

5e01ea19e9dc277128008c0b.Description: Rotor 43 muzzle brake is designed for installation on SVD 7.62x54R. Although positioned as a muzzle brake, it also works as a sound suppressor.
5e01ea19e9dc277128008c0b.Name: Rotor 43 7.62x54R muzzle brake

5e01ef6886f77445f643baa4.Description: One of the most recent tactical ballistic helmets with extensive customization capabilities. The EXFIL LTP (Lightweight, Tactical, Polymer) bump helmet provides impact protection for maritime environments and a stable, comfortable platform for mounting night vision and other accessories. The built-in NVG shroud utilizes an integrated Wilcox machined aluminum shroud insert. Coyote Tan colored version.
5e01ef6886f77445f643baa4.Name: Team Wendy EXFIL Ballistic Helmet (Coyote Tan)

5e01f31d86f77465cf261343.Description: Additional armored ear covers for a Team Wendy EXFIL Ballistic helmet.
5e01f31d86f77465cf261343.Name: TW EXFIL Ear Covers (Coyote Tan)

5e01f37686f774773c6f6c15.Description: Low-profile, lightweight bulletproof glass faceplate that quickly and tool-free attaches to the front of the Team Wendy's EXFIL helmet.
5e01f37686f774773c6f6c15.Name: TW EXFIL Ballistic helmet face shield (Coyote Tan)

5e023cf8186a883be655e54f.Description: 7.62x54 mm R T-46M (GRAU Index - 7T2M) rifle and machine gun cartridge with upgraded T-46M tracer bullet and bimetallic sleeve. The modernization from T-46 to T-46M allowed increased tracing range and ensured a delay in the ignition of the tracer, which allows for better masking of ones firing position. The cartridge is intended for target designation and fire adjustment at longer ranges, as well as for the destruction of manpower and unarmored vehicles.
5e023cf8186a883be655e54f.Name: 7.62x54R T-46M

5e023d34e8a400319a28ed44.Description: 7.62x54 mm R BT (GRAU Index - 7BT1) rifle and machine gun cartridge with armor-piercing tracer BT-90 bullet and bimetallic sleeve. The cartridge was designed to replace the T-46 and T-46M tracer rounds. The BT (Bronebóynaya Trassíruyushchaya - "Armor-piercing Tracer") cartridge is intended for target designation and fire adjustment at longer ranges, as well as for the the destruction of manpower, including manpower equipped with personal protective equipment, and lightly armored vehicles.
5e023d34e8a400319a28ed44.Name: 7.62x54R BT gzh

5e023d48186a883be655e551.Description: 7.62x54 mm R BS (GRAU Index - 7N37) sniper rifle cartridge with an armor-piercing BS bullet and steel sleeve designed for increased efficiency and penetration when fired from an SVD.
5e023d48186a883be655e551.Name: 7.62x54R BS

5e023e53d4353e3302577c4c.Description: A 7.62x51mm BCP FMJ cartridge with a 10.9 gram lead core bullet with a bimetallic jacket in a steel case; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice, produced by Barnaul Cartridge Plant. Despite its rudimentary design, this cartridge is capable of providing an outstanding stopping power effect, as well as being able to pierce through basic ballistic body protections as well as some intermediate models.
5e023e53d4353e3302577c4c.Name: 7.62x51mm BCP FMJ

5e023e6e34d52a55c3304f71.Description: A 7.62x51mm cartridge with a 10.7 gram lead core soft-point (SP) bullet with a bimetallic semi-jacket in a steel case; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice, produced by Tula Cartridge Works. This cartridge is aimed at the amateur public, both hunting, recreational and sport shooting, thanks to its versatility, as well as being able to pierce through basic ballistic body protections and providing excellent results against intermediate models, however, it has a high probability of bouncing off various surfaces.
5e023e6e34d52a55c3304f71.Name: 7.62x51mm TCW SP

5e023e88277cce2b522ff2b1.Description: A 7.62x51mm Ultra Nosler cartridge with a 10.6 gram soft-point bullet with two lead cores separated by a solid partition fused to the copper semi-jacketed, in a steel case; intended for hunting, and target practice. Thanks to its design, this cartridge provides one of the best energy transference of its caliber, being able to cause severe adverse effects on the target after impact due to the rear core, thus offering an outstanding stopping power effect.
5e023e88277cce2b522ff2b1.Name: 7.62x51mm Ultra Nosler

5e208b9842457a4a7a33d074.Description: DTKP 7.62x39 sound suppressor from the Hexagon company. Designed for modern modification of AK with a 24x1.5 thread.
5e208b9842457a4a7a33d074.Name: AK Hexagon DTKP MK.2 7.62x39 sound suppressor

5e217ba4c1434648c13568cd.Description: Lightweight "Kocherga" stock for AKM/AK-74 series assault rifles, manufactured by Hexagon. Colored in anodized red.
5e217ba4c1434648c13568cd.Name: AKM/AK-74 Hexagon "Kocherga" stock (Anodized Red)

5e2192a498a36665e8337386.Description: A machined aluminum grip with styling queues taken from triangle side folding stocks. Compatible with all AK family weapon systems. Manufactured by Kraft Gun Builders. Anodized Red version.
5e2192a498a36665e8337386.Name: AK KGB MG-47 pistol grip (Anodized Red)

5e21a3c67e40bd02257a008a.Description: A 30-round polymer Magpul Pmag 30 AK/AKM GEN M3 magazine 7.62x39 AK and compatible weapons. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons. The magazine is painted in a banana-like style.
5e21a3c67e40bd02257a008a.Name: AK 7.62x39 Magpul PMAG 30 GEN M3 30-round magazine (Banana)

5e21ca18e4d47f0da15e77dd.Description: CNC Warrior AK adapter allows to install different AR-15 specific muzzle devices on 5.56x45 AK rifles.
5e21ca18e4d47f0da15e77dd.Name: AK 5.56x45 CNC Warrior muzzle device adapter

5e2aedd986f7746d404f3aa4.Description: 3.7 volt battery with a nominal capacity of 3400 mAh. Used in lighting and engineering devices.
5e2aedd986f7746d404f3aa4.Name: GreenBat lithium battery

5e2aee0a86f774755a234b62.Description: A special rechargeable battery for industrial and military devices.
5e2aee0a86f774755a234b62.Name: Cyclon rechargeable battery

5e2aef7986f7746d3f3c33f5.Description: Aerosol against mosquitoes, flies and other small insects.
5e2aef7986f7746d3f3c33f5.Name: Repellent

5e2af00086f7746d3f3c33f7.Description: A solution of inorganic alkali, additionally containing active additives. Used for cleaning toilets, pipes and drains.
5e2af00086f7746d3f3c33f7.Name: Smoked Chimney drain cleaner

5e2af02c86f7746d420957d4.Description: Chlorine lime is a highly hazardous technical mixture of hypochlorite, chloride and calcium hydroxide. Widely used for bleaching and disinfection.
5e2af02c86f7746d420957d4.Name: Pack of chlorine

5e2af22086f7746d3f3c33fa.Description: An adhesive composition that has a high degree of plasticity. It consists of epoxy resin and is a two-component substance with metal dust.
5e2af22086f7746d3f3c33fa.Name: Tube of Poxeram cold welding

5e2af29386f7746d4159f077.Description: KEKTAPE will not be able to patch up your difficult Tarkov fate, but it will be able to fix a boat. Or close up a hole in the aquarium. There are lots of things KEKTAPE can do.
5e2af29386f7746d4159f077.Name: KEKTAPE duct tape

5e2af2bc86f7746d3f3c33fc.Description: Special hunting matches that burn in the wind and in the water (yeah, for real!). Soviet heritage.
5e2af2bc86f7746d3f3c33fc.Name: Hunting matches

5e2af37686f774755a234b65.Description: Water- and windproof lighter for survival in difficult conditions. Well, or just for lighting up the cig, you decide, brother.
5e2af37686f774755a234b65.Name: SurvL Survivor Lighter

5e2af41e86f774755a234b67.Description: A polyamide fabric, in which due to the special structure of the thread (made from cut and twisted fibers) fourfold resistance to abrasion is achieved compared to plain nylon, also consisting of polyamide. Significantly superior to conventional fabric in tensile strength and abrasion resistance. Used for the manufacture of equipment for various purposes: bags, backpack modular pouches, waist and bag belts, cases for carrying weapons and so on.
5e2af41e86f774755a234b67.Name: Cordura polyamide fabric

5e2af47786f7746d404f3aaa.Description: Insulated, lightweight and water-repellent fabric for the production of various clothes, both military and civilian.
5e2af47786f7746d404f3aaa.Name: Fleece fabric

5e2af4a786f7746d3f3c3400.Description: Ripstop fabrics are woven fabrics, often made of nylon, using a special reinforcing technique that makes them resistant to tearing and ripping. Used for special and military cloth and gear production.
5e2af4a786f7746d3f3c3400.Name: Ripstop fabric

5e2af4d286f7746d4159f07a.Description: Aramid fibers are a class of heat-resistant and strong synthetic fabric. They are used in aerospace and military applications, for ballistic-rated body armor fabric and ballistic composites, in bicycle tires, marine cordage, marine hull reinforcement, and as an asbestos substitute.
5e2af4d286f7746d4159f07a.Name: Aramid fiber fabric

5e2af51086f7746d3f3c3402.Description: Universalny Zapal Ruchnoy Granaty Modernizirovanny ("Unified Fuse Hand Grenade Modified") - unlike UZRG, it contains a slow-burned pyrotechnic composition with high combustion stability and an azide detonator capsule in an aluminum sleeve inside the aluminum bushings. A vital component for the production of grenades.
5e2af51086f7746d3f3c3402.Name: UZRGM grenade fuze

5e2af55f86f7746d4159f07c.Description: Large case for hand grenade storage.
5e2af55f86f7746d4159f07c.Name: Grenade case

5e32f56fcb6d5863cc5e5ee4.Description: Hand-made "Khattabka" hand grenade based on VOG-17 grenade launcher shell. The grenade is a VOG-17 shell with a removed head part, added detonator and self-destructor. A short fuse has been installed to speed up the ignition. An extremely deadly grenade.
5e32f56fcb6d5863cc5e5ee4.Name: VOG-17 Khattabka grenade

5e340dcdcb6d5863cc5e5efb.Description: Hand-made "Khattabka" hand grenade based on VOG-25 grenade launcher shell. The grenade is a VOG-25 shell with a removed head part, added detonator and self-destructor. A short fuse has been installed to speed up the ignition. An extremely deadly grenade.
5e340dcdcb6d5863cc5e5efb.Name: VOG-25 Khattabka grenade

5e42c71586f7747f245e1343.Description: Key to the ULTRA shopping mall medical storage room.
5e42c71586f7747f245e1343.Name: ULTRA medical storage key

5e42c81886f7742a01529f57.Description: Electronic limited-use access keycard that according to the logo on the front, belongs to TerraGroup.
5e42c81886f7742a01529f57.Name: Object #11SR keycard

5e42c83786f7742a021fdf3c.Description: Electronic limited-use access keycard that according to the logo on the front, belongs to TerraGroup.
5e42c83786f7742a021fdf3c.Name: Object #21WS keycard

5e4abb5086f77406975c9342.Description: A simple lightweight plate carrier manufactured by London Bridge Trading. The most minimalistic design intended for use with chest rigs.
5e4abb5086f77406975c9342.Name: LBT 6094A Slick Plate Carrier

5e4abc1f86f774069619fbaa.Description: Ultra-compact and lightweight chest rig for mobility and comfort.
5e4abc1f86f774069619fbaa.Name: Spiritus Systems Bank Robber chest rig

5e4abc6786f77406812bd572.Description: A low-profile medical backpack, designed to carry large amounts of specialized medical equipment and supplies.
5e4abc6786f77406812bd572.Name: LBT-2670 Slim Field Med Pack

5e4abfed86f77406a2713cf7.Description: Simple and fairly convenient tactical rig. It is still actively used by security and law enforcement agencies and civilian shooters in Russia.
5e4abfed86f77406a2713cf7.Name: Splav Tarzan M22 chest rig

5e4ac41886f77406a511c9a8.Description: The second generation of modification of the CPC body armor designed by Crye Precision and adapted by Ars Arma for use by special forces of the Russian Federation. This modular body armor is based on a polymer corset that fits the body, which avoids the backlash of the body arm during active movement and also contributes to an evener distribution of weight. Made in the assault configuration of pouches and armor elements.
5e4ac41886f77406a511c9a8.Name: Ars Arma CPC MOD.2 plate carrier

5e4bfc1586f774264f7582d3.Description: Ballistic helmet MSA TC 800, designed for use by tactical teams of police special forces, in combat and reconnaissance operations. It can be modified by various components.
5e4bfc1586f774264f7582d3.Name: MSA Gallet TC 800 High Cut combat helmet

5e4d34ca86f774264f758330.Description: Walker's Razor electronic ear muffs feature an ultra low profile design, bluetooth technology and a rubberized coating for added dubarility and comfort.
5e4d34ca86f774264f758330.Name: Walker's Razor digital headset

5e54f62086f774219b0f1937.Description: Raven figurine made of rare materials. The word "Markstrom" is engraved on the base.
5e54f62086f774219b0f1937.Name: Raven figurine

5e54f6af86f7742199090bf3.Description: The famous Dr.Lupo's huge coffee beans. They are humongous! The roasting is as hardcore as possible, definitely will hit hard.
5e54f6af86f7742199090bf3.Name: Can of Dr. Lupo's coffee beans

5e54f76986f7740366043752.Description: Extremely stylish half mask with the Shroud logo. All the Tarkov street guys know who he is.
5e54f76986f7740366043752.Name: Shroud half-mask

5e54f79686f7744022011103.Description: Restored mask of the plague doctor Pestily. A rare and terrifying thing used by cultists in Tarkov.
5e54f79686f7744022011103.Name: Pestily plague mask

5e56991336989c75ab4f03f6.Description: A prototype handguard for the modern SVD sniper rifle kit. Manufactured by Izhmash.
5e56991336989c75ab4f03f6.Name: SVD modern handguard

5e5699df2161e06ac158df6f.Description: XRS-DRG Picatinny handguard for SVD sniper rifles provides a a rigid lightweight accessory platform and multiple mounting positions. Manufactured by CAA Industries.
5e5699df2161e06ac158df6f.Name: SVD CAA XRS-DRG handguard

5e569a0156edd02abe09f27d.Description: Izhmash-produced prototype of a top rail designed for the modern SVD sniper rifle kit.
5e569a0156edd02abe09f27d.Name: SVD modern top rail

5e569a132642e66b0b68015c.Description: A Picatinny rail for SVD sniper rifle for mounting on the barrel. Allows installation of additional tactical devices.
5e569a132642e66b0b68015c.Name: SVD CAA DRG L-1 mount rail

5e569a2e56edd02abe09f280.Description: Side clip top Picatinny rail For SVD sniper rifle and compatibles, manufactured by CAA.
5e569a2e56edd02abe09f280.Name: SVD CAA XD RGL receiver mount

5e71f6be86f77429f2683c44.Description: Special mask from the Twitch Rivals 2020 event.
5e71f6be86f77429f2683c44.Name: Twitch Rivals 2020 mask

5e71f70186f77429ee09f183.Description: Special glasses from the Twitch Rivals 2020 event.
5e71f70186f77429ee09f183.Name: Twitch Rivals 2020 glasses

5e71fad086f77422443d4604.Description: A special half mask from the Twitch Rivals 2020 event.
5e71fad086f77422443d4604.Name: Twitch Rivals 2020 half mask

5e81c3cbac2bb513793cdc75.Description:
Commonly known as just "1911", the M1911 is one of the most famous handguns on the planet. It went through both Word Wars as the US Army's standard-issue, and despite being replaced in 1986, its further variations are still being used as the sidearm of different US Special Forces.
The M1911A1 is the second generation of the original M1911 pistol. After World War I, the military's Model 1911 went through various changes including a shorter trigger with frame cuts, improved iron sights, an arched mainspring housing, and a redesigned grip safety.
5e81c3cbac2bb513793cdc75.Name: Colt M1911A1 .45 ACP pistol

5e81c4ca763d9f754677befa.Description: Colt-manufactured standard-issue 7-round .45 ACP magazine for the M1911-series pistols.
5e81c4ca763d9f754677befa.Name: M1911A1 .45 ACP 7-round magazine

5e81c6bf763d9f754677beff.Description: Colt-manufactured standard-issue M1911A1 polymer pistol grip.
5e81c6bf763d9f754677beff.Name: M1911A1 polymer pistol grip

5e81ebcd8e146c7080625e15.Description: Standalone buttstock assembly with an attached FN40GL Mk2 grenade launcher. It is designed to use the full variety of NATO standard 40mm grenades. Manufactured by Fabrique Nationale Herstal.
5e81ebcd8e146c7080625e15.Name: FN40GL Mk2 grenade launcher

5e81ee213397a21db957f6a6.Description: Colt-manufactured standard-issue M1911A1 front iron sight.
5e81ee213397a21db957f6a6.Name: M1911A1 front sight

5e81f423763d9f754677bf2e.Description: A .45 ACP (11.43x23mm) Match FMJ cartridge (Cartridge, Caliber .45, Ball, Match, M1911) with a 14.9 gram lead core bullet with a copper jacket, in a brass case. This cartridge is manufactured with an increased accuracy to meet the needs of modern .45 ACP caliber weaponry used by the United States Armed Forces, being capable of piercing basic ballistic body protection as well as offering a significant stopping power effect.
5e81f423763d9f754677bf2e.Name: .45 ACP Match FMJ

5e831507ea0a7c419c2f9bd9.Description: The hemostatic tourniquet is named after Friedrich August von Esmarch, who proposed its use, along with other methods in military field surgery.
5e831507ea0a7c419c2f9bd9.Name: Esmarch tourniquet

5e8488fa988a8701445df1e4.Description: The CALOK-B applicator hemostatic agent allows you to inject hemostatic granules through a wound opening directly to the source of bleeding in just a few seconds.
5e8488fa988a8701445df1e4.Name: CALOK-B hemostatic applicator

5e848cc2988a8701445df1e8.Description: The KS-23 is a Russian shotgun, although because it uses a rifled barrel it is officially designated by the Russian military as a carbine. KS stands for Karabin Spetsialniy, "Special Carbine". It is renowned for its large caliber, firing a 23 mm round, equating to 6.27 gauge using the British and American standards of shotgun gauges and approximately 4 gauge using the current European standards (based on the metric CIP tables), making it the largest-bore shotgun in use today.
5e848cc2988a8701445df1e8.Name: TOZ KS-23M 23x75mm pump-action shotgun

5e848d1c264f7c180b5e35a9.Description: 510mm long barrel for KS-23 23x75mm pump-action shotgun.
5e848d1c264f7c180b5e35a9.Name: KS-23 23x75 510mm barrel

5e848d2eea0a7c419c2f9bfd.Description: 700mm long barrel for KS-23 23x75mm pump-action shotgun.
5e848d2eea0a7c419c2f9bfd.Name: KS-23 23x75 700mm barrel

5e848d51e4dbc5266a4ec63b.Description: Polymer forestock made for KS-23M shotgun.
5e848d51e4dbc5266a4ec63b.Name: KS-23M forestock

5e848d99865c0f329958c83b.Description: A polymer pistol grip for KS-23M, produced by TOZ.
5e848d99865c0f329958c83b.Name: KS-23M polymer pistol grip

5e848db4681bea2ada00daa9.Description: Wooden stock for KS-23 shotgun with rubber butt-plate.
5e848db4681bea2ada00daa9.Name: KS-23 wooden stock

5e848dc4e4dbc5266a4ec63d.Description: Steel wired stock for KS-23M shotgun.
5e848dc4e4dbc5266a4ec63d.Name: KS-23M wire stock

5e85a9a6eacf8c039e4e2ac1.Description: 23x75 mm R "Shrapnel-10" buckshot round with a rated maximum effective range of 10 meters.
5e85a9a6eacf8c039e4e2ac1.Name: 23x75mm "Shrapnel-10" buckshot

5e85a9f4add9fe03027d9bf1.Description: 23x75 mm R "Zvezda" ("Star") flash-bang grenade cartridge made for psychological effect on the enemy.
5e85a9f4add9fe03027d9bf1.Name: 23x75mm "Zvezda" flashbang round

5e85aa1a988a8701445df1f5.Description: A 23x75 mm R "Barrikada" ("Barricade") cartridge with solid steel projectile able to destroy the engine block of a car at up to 100 meters.
5e85aa1a988a8701445df1f5.Name: 23x75mm "Barrikada" slug

5e870397991fd70db46995c8.Description: The Mossberg 500 Series is one of the most famous and widespread pump-action shotguns in the world. Protects your front lawn since 1961.
5e870397991fd70db46995c8.Name: Mossberg 590A1 12ga pump-action shotgun

5e87071478f43e51ca2de5e1.Description: A 20 inch (508mm) barrel for Mossberg M590A1 12 gauge pump-action shotgun.
5e87071478f43e51ca2de5e1.Name: M590A1 12ga 20 inch barrel

5e87076ce2db31558c75a11d.Description: Polymer forestock made for Mossberg M590A1 pump-action shotgun.
5e87076ce2db31558c75a11d.Name: M590A1 SpeedFeed short forestock

5e87080c81c4ed43e83cefda.Description: An 8-shell capacity magazine cap for Mossberg M590A1 12ga shells.
5e87080c81c4ed43e83cefda.Name: M590A1 12ga 8-shell magazine cap

5e8708d4ae379e67d22e0102.Description: Ghost ring front sight for M590 pump-action shotguns, manufactured by Mossberg.
5e8708d4ae379e67d22e0102.Name: M590 ghost ring front sight

5e87114fe2db31558c75a120.Description: Ghost ring rear sight for M590 pump-action shotguns, manufactured by Mossberg.
5e87114fe2db31558c75a120.Name: M590 ghost ring rear sight

5e87116b81c4ed43e83cefdd.Description: Classical looking polymer stock for Mossberg M590A1 shotguns with rubber butt-plate.
5e87116b81c4ed43e83cefdd.Name: M590A1 polymer stock

5e8f3423fd7471236e6e3b64.Description: Norvinsky Premium, a truly refreshing kvass. Kvass is made by the natural fermentation of bread, such as wheat, rye, or barley, and sometimes flavoured using fruit, berries, raisins, or birch sap. One of the traditional Slavic drinks, it is not just a tasty, but also a healthy product. It is for a reason that in Russian tales it is constantly drunk by Bogatyrs to regain their power.
5e8f3423fd7471236e6e3b64.Name: Premium Kvass "Norvinskiy Yadreniy" 0.6L bottle

5e997f0b86f7741ac73993e2.Description: A medical bag, often used by mid and low rank medical personnel, sometimes by doctors, for carrying tools and medicine.
5e997f0b86f7741ac73993e2.Name: Sanitar's bag

5e9dacf986f774054d6b89f4.Description: Operational kit FORT "Defender-2" - a modification of the popular body armor FORT "Defender" designed for both VIP and for employees of operational combat units. The kit uses the maximum capabilities of the modular principle of building armor based on steel plates.
5e9dacf986f774054d6b89f4.Name: FORT Defender-2 body armor

5e9db13186f7742f845ee9d3.Description: Tactical bearing system designed to carry magazines, grenades and special equipment, while using low-profile body armor. Manufactured by London Bridge Trading.
5e9db13186f7742f845ee9d3.Name: LBT-1961A Load Bearing chest rig

5e9dcf5986f7746c417435b3.Description: A simple and reliable 14-liter backpack in Multicam Black camouflage. Manufactured by London Bridge Trading.
5e9dcf5986f7746c417435b3.Name: LBT-8005A Day Pack backpack

5ea02bb600685063ec28bfa1.Description: A 10.6 inch (269mm) long barrel for the PPSh-41, chambered in 7.62x25.
5ea02bb600685063ec28bfa1.Name: PPSh-41 7.62x25 10.6 inch barrel

5ea034eb5aad6446a939737b.Description: A 35-round 7.62x25 steel magazine for the PPSh-41.
5ea034eb5aad6446a939737b.Name: PPSh-41 7.62x25 35-round magazine

5ea034f65aad6446a939737e.Description: A 71-round 7.62x25 steel magazine for the PPSh-41.
5ea034f65aad6446a939737e.Name: PPSh-41 7.62x25 71-round drum magazine

5ea03f7400685063ec28bfa8.Description: The PPSh-41 (Pistolet-Pulemyot Shpagina - "Shpagin's submachine gun") is a Soviet submachine gun designed by Georgy Shpagin as a cheap, reliable, and simplified alternative to the PPD-40.
5ea03f7400685063ec28bfa8.Name: PPSh-41 7.62x25 submachine gun

5ea058e01dbce517f324b3e2.Description:
Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper Ops-Core helmet type ballistic mask module based on the famous movie universe.

This is the way.
5ea058e01dbce517f324b3e2.Name: Tac-Kek Heavy Trooper mask

5ea05cf85ad9772e6624305d.Description:
A lower protection class replica of the Ops-Core FAST MT Super High Cut Helmet from Tac-Kek.
Features Ops-Core ARC Rails for attaching various components to the helmet.
5ea05cf85ad9772e6624305d.Name: Tac-Kek FAST MT Helmet

5ea16acdfadf1d18c87b0784.Description: Geissele SMR 9.5 inch M-LOK handguard for AR-15 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.
5ea16acdfadf1d18c87b0784.Name: AR-15 Geissele SMR MK16 9.5 inch M-LOK handguard

5ea16ada09aa976f2e7a51be.Description: Geissele SMR 13.5 inch M-LOK handguard for AR-15 equipped with an M-LOK interface for installation of additional devices and accessories.
5ea16ada09aa976f2e7a51be.Name: AR-15 Geissele SMR MK16 13.5 inch M-LOK handguard

5ea16d4d5aad6446a939753d.Description: Geissele Airborne Charging Handle for AR-15 and compatible systems.
5ea16d4d5aad6446a939753d.Name: AR-15 Geissele ACH charging handle

5ea172e498dacb342978818e.Description: The advanced SureFire FH556RC-556 four-prong flash hider, which fits M4/M16 weapons and variants, features a greatly reduced muzzle flash. Allows the mounting of SOCOM556 Quick Detach sound suppressors.
5ea172e498dacb342978818e.Name: AR-15 SureFire FH556RC 5.56x45 flash hider

5ea17bbc09aa976f2e7a51cd.Description: Surefire SOCOM556-RC2 5.56x45 and .223 sound suppressor, can only be installed on compatible Surefire muzzle devices.
5ea17bbc09aa976f2e7a51cd.Name: Surefire SOCOM556-RC2 5.56x45 sound suppressor

5ea17ca01412a1425304d1c0.Description: According to the manufacturer - the Bastion helmet is the first combat helmet that can withstand a hit from a rifle, even with a bullet with a armored core at a muzzle speed.
5ea17ca01412a1425304d1c0.Name: Diamond Age Bastion helmet

5ea18c84ecf1982c7712d9a2.Description: Optional modular armor protection for Diamond Age Bastion helmet.
5ea18c84ecf1982c7712d9a2.Name: Bastion helmet armor plate

5ea2a8e200685063ec28c05a.Description: A .45 ACP (11.43x23mm) RIP (Radically Invasive Projectile), is a cartridge with a 10.5 gram frangible bullet designed to produce multiple wound channels to incapacitate assailants quickly. In a departure from conventional hollow-point design, the "R.I.P." round features 8 machined lead-free copper petals or "trocars", designed to fragment quickly and move in multiple directions, thus providing a superior stopping power effect of its caliber, in addition to being able to inflict severe adverse effects on the target after impact.
5ea2a8e200685063ec28c05a.Name: .45 ACP RIP

5ed515c8d380ab312177c0fa.Description: Combat drug. It has a stimulating effect on the Central nervous system. Increases perception and attention. It can slightly improve strength indicators, due to more powerful signals to the muscles. The active substance is 3-(b-Phenylisopropyl)-sydnonimine hydrochloride. Only military doctors and paramedics are allowed to use it.
5ed515c8d380ab312177c0fa.Name: 3-(b-TG) stimulant injector

5ed515e03a40a50460332579.Description: Sterile disposable syringe with a dose of L1, based on norepinephrine. It is used for short-term increase of strength and endurance, as well as to reduce the pain effect. This activates the implementation of a physiological response such as "hit or run". Increases water and energy consumption.
5ed515e03a40a50460332579.Name: L1 (Norepinephrine) injector

5ed515ece452db0eb56fc028.Description: Combat stimulant. Developed by TerraGroup Labs, marked as P22. It allows the tissues of the body to receive less damage when physically exposed due to passive inclusion in the work of internal muscles. It is used to expand the body's abilities before a fight. Authorized for use by special forces soldiers. It has side effects.
5ed515ece452db0eb56fc028.Name: P22 injector

5ed515f6915ec335206e4152.Description: Military drug based on human antihemophilic factor. Developed by TerraGroup Labs as a powerful coagulant specifically for USEC operatives. Temporarily stops bleeding and increases resistance to new ones. Slightly improves health indicators, leads to dehydration.
5ed515f6915ec335206e4152.Name: AHF1-M stimulant injector

5ed5160a87bb8443d10680b5.Description: A drug developed for athletes. Allows conducting more intensive training and recovering stamina faster. Temporarily increases strength, endurance,and also accelerates recovery. An undocumented property was also found: it increases the resistance of tissues to physical impact due to internal muscle tension. Because of its properties, it was later adopted by the military as a combat stimulant. Has side effects.
5ed5160a87bb8443d10680b5.Name: Meldonin injector

5ed51652f6c34d2cc26336a1.Description: Muscular Ultra Large Exciter. It is used to expand the body's abilities before long marches. It allows the body to carry an increased weight for a long time. It has shown effectiveness in combat operations in areas where transport is not available. Authorized for use by special forces soldiers. Developed by TerraGroup Labs, marked with the name M. U. L. E.
5ed51652f6c34d2cc26336a1.Name: M.U.L.E. stimulant injector

5ed5166ad380ab312177c100.Description: A syringe with a homemade drug, authored by a former employee of TerraGroup Labs. The negative effects are different each time. You could take the risk, got nothing to lose anyway.
5ed5166ad380ab312177c100.Name: "Obdolbos" cocktail injector

5ede4739e0350d05467f73e8.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 15-30 meters from the muzzle.
5ede4739e0350d05467f73e8.Name: 40x46mm M406 (HE) grenade

5ede47405b097655935d7d16.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 2-3 meters from the muzzle.
5ede47405b097655935d7d16.Name: 40x46mm M441(HE) grenade

5ede474b0c226a66f5402622.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 2-3 meters from the muzzle.
5ede474b0c226a66f5402622.Name: 40x46mm M381(HE) grenade

5ede475339ee016e8c534742.Description: 40x46mm M576 (MP-APERS) Multi Projectile buckshot cartridge for grenade launchers fitted with twenty 24-grain bullets for maximum damage in close quarters combat.
5ede475339ee016e8c534742.Name: 40x46mm M576 (MP-APERS) grenade

5ede475b549eed7c6d5c18fb.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 15-30 meters from the muzzle.
5ede475b549eed7c6d5c18fb.Name: 40x46mm M386 (HE) grenade

5ede7a8229445733cb4c18e2.Description: Federal State Reserve Agency base bunker command office room key with multiple strange symbols scratched onto it where the room label would usually be. The key is stained by blood and appears to have been misused a lot, making it fragile.
5ede7a8229445733cb4c18e2.Name: RB-PKPM marked key

5ede7b0c6d23e5473e6e8c66.Description: Key to the Federal State Reserve Agency base Radar Station (Queen) document archives.
5ede7b0c6d23e5473e6e8c66.Name: RB-RLSA key

5eea21647547d6330471b3c9.Description: Magpul manufactured forestock, made for Mossberg M500/M590 shotguns.
5eea21647547d6330471b3c9.Name: M590A1 Magpul MOE forestock

5eea217fc64c5d0dfc05712a.Description: Ergonomic polymer stock for Mossberg M590A1 shotgun with rubber butt-plate manufactured by Magpul.
5eea217fc64c5d0dfc05712a.Name: M590A1 Magpul SGA stock

5eeb2ff5ea4f8b73c827350b.Description: Picatinny rail mount for Mossberg 590A1 pump-action shotguns.
5eeb2ff5ea4f8b73c827350b.Name: M590A1 tactical rail

5ef1b9f0c64c5d0dfc0571a1.Description: Mesa Tactical’s Telescoping Stock Conversion Kit replaces the standard buttstock with an adapter that accepts AR style collapsible stocks and pistol grips.
5ef1b9f0c64c5d0dfc0571a1.Name: M590A1 Mesa Tactical LEO gen.1 stock adapter

5ef1ba28c64c5d0dfc0571a5.Description: Crosshair Hydraulic buffer tube, can be installed on a LEO stock adapter. Manufactured by Mesa Tactical.
5ef1ba28c64c5d0dfc0571a5.Name: Mesa Tactical Crosshair Hydraulic buffer tube

5ef32e4d1c1fd62aea6a150d.Description: Trik Trigger for M1911A1 pistols, manufactured by Caspian Arms.
5ef32e4d1c1fd62aea6a150d.Name: M1911A1 Caspian Arms Trik Trigger

5ef3448ab37dfd6af863525c.Description: An 11-round .45 ACP magazine for the Colt M1911A1 pistol, manufactured by Mec-Gar.
5ef3448ab37dfd6af863525c.Name: M1911A1 .45 ACP Mec-Gar 11-round magazine

5ef3553c43cb350a955a7ccb.Description: Extended slide lever for M1911A1 pistols, product by Wilson.
5ef3553c43cb350a955a7ccb.Name: M1911A1 Wilson Extended slide stop

5ef35bc243cb350a955a7ccd.Description: Ultralight skeletonized hammer for M1911A1, product by Wilson.
5ef35bc243cb350a955a7ccd.Name: M1911A1 Wilson Ultralight skeletonized hammer

5ef35f46382a846010715a96.Description: HEX hammer for M1911A1 pistols, product by STI.
5ef35f46382a846010715a96.Name: M1911A1 STI HEX hammer

5ef366938cef260c0642acad.Description: An American Legend grip #423 for the M1911A1, produced by Pachmayr.
5ef366938cef260c0642acad.Name: M1911A1 Pachmayr American Legend grip #423

5ef369b08cef260c0642acaf.Description: NcSTAR Trigger guard mount for M1911A1 pistols.
5ef369b08cef260c0642acaf.Name: M1911A1 NcSTAR trigger guard mount

5ef5d994dfbc9f3c660ded95.Description: Weig-a-tinny rail mount for M1911A1 pistols, manufactured by Weigand.
5ef5d994dfbc9f3c660ded95.Name: M1911A1 Weigand Weig-a-tinny rail mount

5ef61964ec7f42238c31e0c1.Description: Anarchy Outdoors Muzzle Brake for M1911A1 pistols.
5ef61964ec7f42238c31e0c1.Name: M1911A1 Anarchy Outdoors muzzle brake

5efaf417aeb21837e749c7f2.Description: The all-milled B-30 handguard is made of D16T aluminum alloy with a black coating, it is intended for installing on the AK assault rifle series 103, 104, 105, 74S, 74M, AKM, AKMS in the standard place of the handguard. The B-31S rail mount above the gas tube is an all-milled bracket made of D16T aluminum alloy with a black coating, mounted on the B-30 handguard. © «Zenit»
5efaf417aeb21837e749c7f2.Name: B-30 handguard with B-31S upper handguard rail

5efb0c1bd79ff02a1f5e68d9.Description: A 7.62x51mm NATO M993 cartridge with an 8.2 gram armor-piercing bullet with a tungsten carbide penetrator over an aluminum base with a copper jacket, in a brass case. This cartridge was designed during the 1990s to provide United States Armed Forces personnel with capabilities to pierce light covers and light armored vehicles, in addition to providing excellent results against the most modern specialized ballistic body protections.
5efb0c1bd79ff02a1f5e68d9.Name: 7.62x51mm M993

5efb0cabfb3e451d70735af5.Description: A .45 ACP (11.43x23mm) AP cartridge with a two-part controlled fragmenting projectile, an armor-piercing bullet that features a brass sabot and a hardened steel penetrator of 7mm. Thanks to the design of this AP bullet (Armor-Piercing) and despite having an average muzzle velocity relative to other cartridges of the same caliber, it has capabilities of piercing basic ballistic body protection along with some intermediate models and still provides a significant stopping power effect.
5efb0cabfb3e451d70735af5.Name: .45 ACP AP

5efb0d4f4bc50b58e81710f3.Description: A .45 ACP (11.43x23mm) Lasermatch FMJ cartridge with a 14.5 gram lead core bullet with a copper jacket, in a brass case; intended for target designation and fire adjustment in battle (Trace color: Red). This cartridge was designed to provide tracing capabilities to .45 ACP caliber submachine guns during automatic fire, as well as offering a considerable stopping power effect and being able to pierce basic ballistic body protection.
5efb0d4f4bc50b58e81710f3.Name: .45 ACP Lasermatch FMJ

5efb0da7a29a85116f6ea05f.Description: A 9x19mm Parabellum PBP gzh (GRAU Index - 7N31) cartridge with a 4.1 gram armor-piercing bullet with a hardened carbon steel core with a cylindrical aluminum cladding and bimetallic semi-jacket in a bimetallic case. This bullet design is based on experiences with various armor-piercing pistol cartridges in the late 1990s, aimed to neutralize hostile personnel equipped with basic and intermediate ballistic body protection, in addition to being capable of piercing light covers, and having an outstanding muzzle velocity.
5efb0da7a29a85116f6ea05f.Name: 9x19mm PBP gzh

5efb0e16aeb21837e749c7ff.Description: A 9x19mm Parabellum QuakeMaker cartridge with an 11.9 gram hollow-point bullet made entirely of lead in a lightweight case of steel with a red anodized aluminum base; intended for home defense and target practice. Due to its design, this cartridge provides an outstanding stopping power effect along with causing severe adverse effects on the target after impact at the cost of penetration capabilities, as well as having a considerably lower muzzle velocity relative to other cartridges of the same caliber.
5efb0e16aeb21837e749c7ff.Name: 9x19mm QuakeMaker

5efb0fc6aeb21837e749c801.Description: A .45 ACP (11.43x23mm) Hydra-Shok cartridge with a 14.9 gram lead center-post hollow-point bullet with a copper semi-jacket, in a brass case. Despite having a slightly lower muzzle velocity for its caliber, this cartridge provides one of the best energy transference of the .45 ACP caliber, and can cause severe adverse effects on the target after impact, offering an outstanding stopping power effect at the cost of penetration capabilities.
5efb0fc6aeb21837e749c801.Name: .45 ACP Hydra-Shok

5efdaf6de6a30218ed211a48.Description: Medical device for diagnostic examination of the eyes, marked with a strip of tape.
5efdaf6de6a30218ed211a48.Name: Marked Ophthalmoscope

5efdafc1e70b5e33f86de058.Description: A well-worn surgical first aid kit for bullet wounds and other serious injuries and wounds, heavily stained with blood and marked with a strange blue symbol.
5efdafc1e70b5e33f86de058.Name: Surgery kit marked with a blue symbol

5efde6b4f5448336730dbd61.Description: A single-use plastic keycard with a blue color marking, probably for identification. The logo covered by the marking resembles the TerraGroup Labs logo.
5efde6b4f5448336730dbd61.Name: Keycard with a blue marking

5eff09cd30a7dc22fd1ddfed.Description: A key marked with blue duct tape.
5eff09cd30a7dc22fd1ddfed.Name: Health Resort east wing room 110 key with a blue tape

5eff135be0d3331e9d282b7b.Description: Flash drive marked with blue tape. Such flash drives are often used by TerraGroup staff.
5eff135be0d3331e9d282b7b.Name: Flash drive marked with blue tape

5f0596629e22f464da6bbdd9.Description: A custom-made improvised armor-piercing .366 TKM cartridge.
5f0596629e22f464da6bbdd9.Name: .366 TKM AP-M

5f0c892565703e5c461894e9.Description: 40-mm shot with a fragmentation grenade equipped with an instantaneous fuse, which is cocked after the shot, at a distance of 15-30 meters from the muzzle.
5f0c892565703e5c461894e9.Name: 40x46mm M433 (HEDP) grenade

5f2a9575926fd9352339381f.Description: The Kel-Tec RFB (Rifle, Forward-ejection, Bullpup) is a gas-operated bullpup type semi-automatic rifle, manufactured by Kel-Tec. Chambered in 7.62×51mm NATO/.308 Winchester ammunition. The RFB uses metric FAL magazines, which insert straight into the magazine well and do not need to rock into place. The weapon is fully ambidextrous, much in the style of the Belgian F2000 rifle. The RFB is delivered without iron sights. A mil-spec Picatinny rail is provided for mounting a wide range of optics and tactical accessories.
5f2a9575926fd9352339381f.Name: Kel-Tec RFB 7.62x51 carbine

5f2aa43ba9b91d26f20ae6d2.Description: Thread spacer for an RFB rifle, manufactured by Kel-Tec. It is required for installation of different muzzle devices.
5f2aa43ba9b91d26f20ae6d2.Name: RFB thread spacer

5f2aa4464b50c14bcf07acdb.Description: Threading protection cap for the Kel-Tec RFB 7.62x51 rifle barrel.
5f2aa4464b50c14bcf07acdb.Name: RFB thread protection cap

5f2aa4559b44de6b1b4e68d1.Description: The standard RFB 7.62x51 bird cage flash hider, manufactured by Kel-Tec.
5f2aa4559b44de6b1b4e68d1.Name: RFB 7.62x51 flash hider

5f2aa46b878ef416f538b567.Description: An 18 inch long barrel for Kel-Tec RFB rifle, chambered in 7.62x51ammo.
5f2aa46b878ef416f538b567.Name: RFB 7.62x51 18 inch barrel

5f2aa47a200e2c0ee46efa71.Description: Regular RFB rifle handguard, manufactured by Kel-Tec.
5f2aa47a200e2c0ee46efa71.Name: RFB handguard

5f36a0e5fbf956000b716b65.Description: The MEU(SOC) pistol, ("Marine Expeditionary Unit"; "Special Operations Capable") officially designated the M45 MEUSOC, is a magazine-fed, recoil-operated, single-action, semiautomatic pistol chambered for the .45 ACP cartridge. It's a variant of the M1911, and has been the standard-issue side arm for the Force Recon Element of the United States Marine Corps' Marine Expeditionary Units since 1985. The improved M45A1 features several changes to the original M1911A1 design. One feature is the dual recoil spring system that spreads out the recoil force of the .45 ACP round by lowering the peak force of the recoil pulse. It also has 3-dot tritium night sights, a 5-inch national match barrel, ambidextrous safety, a picatinny rail, and a desert tan Cerakote finish.
5f36a0e5fbf956000b716b65.Name: Colt M45A1 .45 ACP pistol

Thanks to its rudimentary design, this cartridge is one of the most economical options of its caliber, and despite this, the bullet in this cartridge has capabilities to pierce basic ballistic body protection, as well as certain intermediate protection equipment, however, it has a significant bounce probability on various surfaces. Its design also allows it to be used in STANAG 5.56x45mm NATO magazines without any problem.

Featuring ambidextrous controls, ergonomic features, and built-in modularity, the Mk-18 is a great choice for the avid hunter, long-range enthusiast, and competition shooter.
